card_text: If this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 "D/D" monster or "Dark Contract" card in your Graveyard, except "D/D Ghost"; send 1 card from your Deck to the Graveyard with that name. If this card is banished: You can target 1 of your banished "D/D" monsters or "Dark Contract" cards, except "D/D Ghost"; return it to the Graveyard.
